tooltip.mega_showdown.adamant_orb.toolti: A glowing orb that boosts Dialga's Dragon- and Steel-type moves.

tooltip.mega_showdown.griseous_orb.toolt: An eerie orb that boosts Giratina's Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.clear_amulet.toolt: An amulet that protects the holder from stat reduction.
tooltip.mega_showdown.lagging_tail.toolt: An item that makes the holder move last in battle.
tooltip.mega_showdown.red_chain.tooltip: A mysterious chain that can summon a legendary Pokémon.
tooltip.mega_showdown.azure_flute.toolti: A flute that is said to summon a legendary Pokémon.
tooltip.mega_showdown.deoxys_meteorite.t: A meteorite that allows Deoxys to change forms.
tooltip.mega_showdown.adrenalineorb.tool: An item that boosts Speed when intimidated.
tooltip.mega_showdown.souldew.tooltip: A mysterious orb that boosts Latios and Latias' power.
tooltip.mega_showdown.gripclaw.tooltip: An item that extends the duration of binding moves.
tooltip.mega_showdown.dynamax_band.toolt: A special band that allows Pokémon to Dynamax during battle.
tooltip.mega_showdown.dynamax_candy.tool: A candy that increases a Pokémon's Dynamax Level, enhancing its strength when Dynamaxed.
tooltip.mega_showdown.wishing_star.toolt: A mysterious stone said to grant Pokémon the power to Dynamax when embedded in a Dynamax Band.
tooltip.mega_showdown.max_honey.tooltip: A rich and sweet honey that can trigger Max moves or be used to make Max Soup.
tooltip.mega_showdown.max_soup.tooltip: A special soup that unlocks the Gigantamax potential of certain Pokémon.
tooltip.mega_showdown.sweet_max_soup.too: A tastier variant of Max Soup, preferred by certain Pokémon when unlocking Gigantamax forms.
tooltip.mega_showdown.max_mushroom.toolt: A rare mushroom with a strong Gigantamax smell. Needed to make Max Soup.
tooltip.mega_showdown.power_spot.tooltip: A block used to create a power area.
tooltip.mega_showdown.luminous_moss.tool: A moss said to glow with mysterious light. It raises Special Defense when hit by a Water-type move.
tooltip.mega_showdown.sparkling_stone_li: A mysterious stone that radiates a gentle light. It resonates with Z-Power.
tooltip.mega_showdown.sparkling_stone_da: A mysterious stone that emits a faint shadowy glow. It resonates with Z-Power.
tooltip.mega_showdown.zygarde_cube.toolt: A cube that collects Zygarde Cells and Cores. It pulses faintly with energy from deep underground.
tooltip.mega_showdown.zygarde_cell.toolt: A component of Zygarde. It's said to be one of many living cells scattered across the world.
tooltip.mega_showdown.zygarde_core.toolt: The brain of Zygarde. It can think and act on its own, guiding the assembly of Zygarde Forms.
tooltip.mega_showdown.reveal_glass.toolt: A mysterious mirror that reveals the true forms of certain Pokémon.
